contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Sentient|sentient}} {{TOCright}} '''Sentient''' may refer to: * [[Sentience]], the ability to perceive subjectively * [[Sentient (video game)|''Sentient'' (video game)]], a videogame developed by Psygnosis in 1997 for the PlayStation and PC * [[Sentient computing]], a form of ubiquitous computing which uses sensors to perceive its environment and react accordingly * [[Sentient Information Systems]], a Dutch software company specialized in data mining * Sentient diet, also referred to as [[Sattvic diet]] * Sentients, an alien race from ''[[Hot Wheels Battle Force 5]]'' {{disambiguation}}
